A blog where I talk about code things.

About

This is a blog I made to talk about programming type things that I find or write. If you find the stuff here interesting, feel free to shoot me an email at smwalto2@illinois.edu or take a look at my resumé or LinkedIn! There are a few older things on my Github that I haven’t written about, so you might as well go check that out too.
